pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, Shoes and socks, plus Goggles or face shield, Chemical-resistant gloves (except for applicators using groundboom equipment), Chemical-resistant apron when mixing, loading, cleaning equipment or spills, or otherwise exposed to the concentrate. Safety glasses can be worn for eye protection ONLY when this product is combined with water at a dilution factor of 3.6x or more. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE. If no such instructions for washables exist, use detergent and hot water. Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry. Discard clothing and other absorbent materials that have been drenched or heavily contaminated with the product’s concentrate. Do not reuse them.
pesticide.trade_Name: Triplet Low Odor Premium Selective Herbicide

Safety_Information.general_Info: Corrosive, causes irreversible eye damage. Do not get in eyes or on clothing. Harmful if swallowed. Remove saturated clothing as soon as possible and shower.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
